column1: Local Foods////The place is really modern 60s look. The layout remind you of a madmen like environment without losing the chic atmosphere. The patio is really nice
column2: there's a construction going on outside but it is both b even noticing from the garden patio. I had their egg salad sandwich
column3: I usually can't stand egg salad but the taste of this one was unique. Needless to say I loved it!
